page.title: 17Infant Playground Games
page.content: At playtime we play the playground games which are fun. I like playing {show jumping.}There are yellow bars painted on the ground and we pretend to have a horse and jump over the painted bars.There are also{mazes}and {train tracks}painted on the playground.We also play a catching game called{Polo}which is played between two walls and you have to touch the walls five times before you are caught. The favourite game in the summer is {Elastics.}You need at least three people to play.Two people have a ring of elastic around their legs and the others have to jump in and over, catching and twisting the elastic with their feet.We play{'Granny's Knickers' {'Big Ben' and'England}Ireland'.There are rhymes to say while you jump.
